name: Yunnan Cross-Bridge Rice Noodles
description: Traditional chicken broth base, served with fresh meat slices and organic rice noodles.

name: Shaanxi Roujiamo (Chinese Burger)
description: Crispy baked bun filled with rich, juicy spiced pork.

name: Cantonese Crystal Shrimp Dumplings
description: Thin, translucent skin filled with whole fresh shrimp.

name: Sichuan Spicy Hotpot Base
description: Authentic beef tallow base, spicy and savory, perfect for home cooking.

name: Peking Roast Duck (Half)
description: Charcoal fruit-wood roasted, crispy skin and tender meat, served with pancakes and sauce.

name: Xinjiang Big Plate Chicken
description: Tender chicken with soft potatoes and broad noodles that soak up the rich sauce.

name: Changsha Stinky Tofu
description: Smells strong but tastes delicious, crispy outside and tender inside, served with secret spicy sauce.

name: Liuzhou Snail Rice Noodles (Luosifen)
description: Sour, spicy, fresh, and hot. Unique sour bamboo shoot flavor, authentic Liuzhou style.

name: Suzhou Fresh Meat Mooncake
description: Layers of flaky pastry, juicy meat filling, perfect balance of savory and sweet.

name: Lanzhou Beef Noodles (Instant Pack)
description: Authentic flavor restoration: Clear soup, white radish, red chili oil, green cilantro, and yellow noodles.
